sreg3 <- summary(reg3)

report_reg3 <- function(i){
  str_glue("{round_(reg3$coefficients[i])} & {round_(reg3.pcse$pcse[i])} & {stars.pval(reg3.pcse$pval[i])}")
}

  str_glue("{round_(reg4$coefficients[i])} & {round_(reg4.pcse$pcse[i])} & {stars.pval(reg4.pcse$pval[i])}")
}
